property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only every message were as perfect as its messenger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knights fight for honor and mercenaries fight for gold. The militia fights for hearth and home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A battle's outcome is never certain." - The Southern Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing can stop the power of life - not even death." - Onean cleric

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . Our castle's strength Will laugh a siege to scorn." - William Shakespeare, Macbeth

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most eagles hunt small animals. The cloudchasers hunt magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Training? Seeing my crops burnt to cinders was all the ‘training' I needed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Elite Archers deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fletch their arrows with the feathers of angels.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A picture is worth a thousand swords.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "North and South meet and angels sing. Voices resound with a righteous ring." - "The Ballad of the Paladins"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soldiers wear down and enemies collapse - but the ballista never tires." - Ballista captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strength of one. The courage of ten.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fool knows no fear. A hero shows no fear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honorable in battle, generous in death. - Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knights are quick to pledge their loyalty and even quicker to charge into battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kings don't make knights. Actions do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say they have the blood of hawks running through their veins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her heart holds the pain of every soldier she's ever healed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How smooth his face, how sure his thoughts. I look forward to breaking his mighty will." - The Eastern Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without warriors there can be no war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A valiant knight's life has no meaning without honor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have no need for these trinkets. We need only the strength of our swords and the virtue of our hearts." - The Northern Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a meteor, it strikes from above without warning. Unlike a meteor, it then carries you off and eats you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Weapons usually bring death. Today, mine will bring life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We spent three weeks trying to knock that wall down. Now it's knocking us down." - Onean sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land will never betray those who gave their lives for it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For he on honey-dew hath fed, And drunk the milk of Paradise." - Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Why does a Samite heal? You might as well ask why a bird flies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The peasants labor for my profit. I approve."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He reads the battlefield like a map, always seeking the shortest route to victory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An angel's blessing prepares a soldier for war better than a thousand military drills.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her sword sings more beautifully than any choir.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With one breath, the newborn angel took to the air . . . and the world sighed." - The Book of Serra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If not for the wizard, we'd all be dead now. 'Course, it was him that started all this in the first place." - Onean veteran

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earliest mystics believed that the falcon slit the sky to let the light break through.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can anyone fight so much yet enjoy it so little?" - The Western Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The noble paladins draw strength from the courage of others.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fight so closely together a mouse couldn't slip past their guard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 3 life for each black creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even in the darkest night Stars and angels still shine bright." - Onean children's rhyme

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The key to winning any fight is simply staying alive." - The Southern Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the wings of fallen dragons refuse to give up the sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I rely not so much on the wisdom of age as on the overconfidence of youth."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the duty of the strong to oppose any who threaten the weak." - The Southern Paladin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Believe in the ideal, not the idol." - Serra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a poor sort of memory that only works backwards." - Lewis Carroll, Through the Looking Glass

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Too many wizards spoil the spell, but too many spells spoil the wizard. - Sign on entry to arcane lab

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is a feast for the mind. Savor every swallow."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He can drown you in his eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sea has many secrets, but some are too big to be kept.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Returne from whence ye came. . . ." - Edmund Spenser, The Faerie Queene

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent You control enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The surface world contains nothing I cannot take." - The Lord of Atlantis

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The coral merfolk delight in wrestling with their foes, skinning them alive on the razor-sharp edges of their reef.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen my master do this a hundred times. How hard can it be?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've thrown your net at the wrong fish." - The Lord of Atlantis

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Delusions of Mediocrity enters the battlefield, you gain 10 life. When Delusions of Mediocrity leaves the battlefield, you lose 10 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When nothing but second best will do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seek balance in all things - as long as the scales are weighted in your favor. - Vodalian saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How many people can you save in that thing?" "All of them," replied the mage with a smile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars in their ivory towers call them "sharks of the sky." Scholars on the road don't call them at all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was as if we fought a shadow." - Onean soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing that flows faster than water is fear.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like arguing with ice - Vodalian expression meaning "wasting your time"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The deep sleep of winter is not always restful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We'll be easy targets if we remain on the ground. Let's take the fight to them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player returns a land they control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mana that binds the world together can also tear it apart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all lands target player controls and that player loses all unspent mana.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remove their power, and their will to fight will follow." - Tolarian wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Mawcor deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Neither head holds a brain - that's located somewhere in the chest - but four eyes aim much better than two.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eri phar phesta . . . um, phistor . . . er, phistara . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you sink a lot of ships, it's easy to find sunken treasure.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The paladins would be wise not to forget about the Pearl Trident. The merfolk warriors have turned the tide of more than one human war . . . and I have no doubt they shall do so again." - Onean scholar

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little things like morals shouldn't hinder one's ambition. - Pirate creed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Exhausting a wizard can be exhausting work.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It can pass through solid matter - but that doesn't mean it's harmless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wastes his amazing talents on proving how amazing he really is.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most people believe magic is only a trick. Why change their minds?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact You control enchanted artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Telepathic Spies enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most spies sneak into enemy camps. These spies sneak into enemy minds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course she's at the head of her class. All of her classmates have disappeared." - Tolarian renegade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies steal jewels for theirs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Why not ask the winds? - Tolarian expression meaning "Who knows?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nope, there's nothing here either. You guys go on ahead, I'll catch up in a minute. . . . Whoo hoo"

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It can stay aloft for weeks with little or no sleep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the air itself protect you, for it is everywhere." - Master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {2}{U}{U}: Wall of Wonder gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They wondered at the size of it. It wondered which to eat first.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But high she shoots through air and light, Above all low delay, Where nothing earthly bounds her flight, Nor shadow dims her way." - Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I dreamt of it once. Now I fear it dreams of me." - Tolarian scholar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think little of the foes I've slain. But I'm haunted by the friends I've sent to die." - The Southern Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bog's touch means death to all but the darkest of hearts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Bellowing Fiend deals damage to a creature, Bellowing Fiend deals 3 damage to that creature's controller and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a green creature dies, its controller discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grief is a razor that slices the soul.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No thrull has ever been burdened with a long life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Think of it as a butcher knife with wings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bodies of its victims are the only tracks it leaves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beware anything born among the dead. - Tolarian saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dakmor Lancer enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The darkness of his shield reflects the inky blackness of his soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hence ‘banishèd' is banished from the world, / And the world's exile is death." - William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The eclipse made it clear whose side the sky was on.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy X target nonblack creatures. Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We live for a thousand years. The death of even one brings untold sorrow." - Elvish elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." - Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Change your mind, or I'll change it for you."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no worse enemy. His passion for death doesn't just border on insanity, it wallows in it." - The Southern Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single germ can kill more soldiers than ten thousand blades.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me." - Fallen angel, to Serra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to keep our own troops from fleeing when he's like this. How can our foes possibly stand against him?" - Field marshal for the Eastern Paladin

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer - both are attractive to thieves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An advisor once asked the Western Paladin how much gold would be enough. "I have no need of fools who can imagine ‘enough,'" he told the advisor's corpse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether it howls for hunger or for joy, you're in trouble just the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "East and West meet and angels cry. Unholy power darkens the sky." - "The Ballad of the Paladins"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has swampwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brackish water, dark and blind Heed my will, to you I bind." - Opening passage of Leshrac's Rite

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memories cut from the mind can cut right back.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What wizards fear most is losing their minds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during your end step. As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. Draw X cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eastern Paladin doesn't attack at night for the tactical advantage. He does it for the sheer joy of fighting beneath the moon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defeating an enemy is not nearly as satisfying as watching one suffer." - The Western Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I want every last one of these tree-hugging, earth-loving, pointy-eared weaklings out of here. Now"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knows whether they were named for the diseases they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He hunts what might have been.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll chew through armor, flesh, and bone. They'll even chew through each other if they're hungry enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice any number of artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. Draw a card for each permanent sacrificed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The battle's end is the meal's beginning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats death and drinks pain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise." - Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They're the fiercest of all the Western Paladin's soldiers. They're also the most fiercely loyal - but that loyalty comes at a price.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the strands call, only the dead answer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The assassin sees only throats and hears only heartbeats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pockets of Æther can be so foul they melt flesh from bone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skeletal wall, strengthened by the souls of traitors, rings the city of the Eastern Paladin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Expect nothing but scorn, flattery, and lies. And never turn your back on him." - The Northern Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The warping of bodies and souls has become the heart of Yawgmoth's existence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, Aether Flash deals 2 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the foul beast appeared, arcane lightning crackled around it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the snowy slopes of Kaelor, To the canyons of Bandu, We drink and fight and feast and die As we were born to do." - Balduvian tavern song

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The generals were dead. The battle plans were forgotten. It was everyone for themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is a slaughter, the death of a sea. Never speak of it again." - The Lord of Atlantis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana on X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hellkites are artists with flames, painting the world with fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Disorder deals 2 damage to each white creature and each player who controls a white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire hurts them almost as much as the chaos that follows. Almost." - The Western Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The intensity of their glare was soon surpassed by the intensity of their attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A reward is worthless if you aren't around to enjoy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Ghitu Fire-Eater: It deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Ghitu believe their race was born of fire, and it's an honor to return to it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hardest part of his training is learning not to eat the boar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Die" - Goblin chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We're elite. You're not. - Infantry motto

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Gardener dies, destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Years of attempts have brought the goblins no closer to growing a sausage tree.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's got two arms, one wing, and no brains?" - Ghitu riddle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok. . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's smart for a goblin. He can do two things: hit and run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins prefer caves to just about anything else. Caves prefer just about anything else to goblins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblin idea of music is to hit something with a stick.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player didn't cast a spell this turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm going to count to three. Three."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead." - Wandering mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll climb down soon. Don't worry, it's just a thundersto - " - Former elvish scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave, He passes from life to his rest in the grave." - William Knox, "Mortality"

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogres learn how to smash stuff even before they learn how to walk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Okk can't attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks. Okk can't block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Burn their homes. Salt their lands. Nothing survives." - The Western Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block. {R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do not judge a lizard by its size. - Ghitu proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the air burns, only death breathes deep." - Bogardan mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who says lightning never strikes twice?" - Storm shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to itself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who play with fire are bound to get burned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be as fast as lightning, and you will be just as deadly." - Combat trainer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here, kitty kitty. Here, kitty kitty. Aaaaugh"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We were ready for an attack from the front, sides, or back - but the mage hit us from below." - Veteran soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She speaks with the voice of the winds, and the earth trembles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That arm's for bashin'. That one's for smashin'. That one's for scratchin'. And that one . . . I don't know what that one's for." - Orgg trainer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The erupting flames work as both barrier and weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire is always at the top of the food chain, and it has a big appetite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'll never find an anaconda in a swamp. It will always find you first.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the ape - they'd never seen it angry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's never been a dwarven smith who could match the marvels that Gaea herself forges." - The Elvish Champion

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The merfolk may rule the waters, but hippos have never had much respect for authority.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a black card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fruit must rot before its seed can sprout. - Yavimaya saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player untaps all basic lands they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give it a week and it will feed an army."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I may seem wise to you, but I'm merely a sapling among mighty oaks."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The archers have a reputation for attacking without warning. They claim that the first arrow is the warning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high." - Elvish hymn

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To an elf, magic and music are the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. - Elvish teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More than any other battlefield, the forest gives the advantage to those who know it best.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Femeref Archers deals 4 damage to target attacking creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bet you can't put it through the eye." "Left or right?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is useful to be able to speak to the trees. But it is truly wondrous to be able to listen to them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Gang of Elk becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I felt the ground shake, so I hid in my tent until the earthquake passed. It passed all right, and it left hoofprints." - Femeref explorer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Watching the spider's web - Llanowar expression meaning "focusing on the wrong thing"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gorilla chief must always be prepared to defend his crown. This leads to some pretty tough apes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They've got claws as long as your arm. And they're grouchy. Really, really grouchy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar covers a million square miles, yet nobody enters the forest without the elves knowing it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the forest wants something, no mortal mind can resist her." - Maro

property.name: Rules
property.value: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No two see the same Maro.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Get in touch with your inner monster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player draws a card for each creature card in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead whisper to the living. If you listen, you will learn." - Maro

property.name: Rules
property.value: All lands are 2/2 creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land rises up to defend against those who would spoil its beauty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's only one thing worse than a hungry lion - many hungry lions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And would you strip the bark from a treefolk? - Elvish expression meaning "Are you crazy?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why should death always have the last word?" - Llanowar druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a basic land card this way, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who understand the forest are free to harvest its bounty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seekers spend their lives protecting a home they rarely visit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where dryads dance, seeds sprout and flowers bloom.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now that's a plan" - Wandering mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the winds blow till they have wakened death. . . ." - William Shakespeare, Othello

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an Island an opponent controls becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their thoughts flow through my mind, and I am healed." - Fyndhorn elder

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Armodons are trained to step on things. Enemy things.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Treefolk Seedlings's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the grandest forest begins with a single seedling. - Llanowar saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No forest is so remote that the elves don't know its secrets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each spell has its own song, and the enchantress knows the dance for each.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring breathes the magic of new life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you stop to listen, you can hear it grow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves long ago mastered the art of hunting with nets. They call it "fishing the sky."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say Aladdin's third wish was for this ring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heavier the load, the harder it works.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eastern Paladin knew how highly his southern rival valued horses, so he gleefully prepared a suitable welcome.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it that the world was hatched from a dingus egg.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bridges usually get you from one place to another. This one just gets you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature spells cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Feroz is gone, but what remains is his final gift to his people: the right to be left alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every day, I fight for my life and win. Every night, I fight to remember my name and lose."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Southern Paladin taught the airborne vermin to fear the storm that rains upward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most books simply deliver knowledge. This one expects some in return.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your heart's desire is found within. - Saddlebag inscription

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is power." - Sir Francis Bacon, Meditationes Sacrae

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bigger they are, the stronger its pull.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step. Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus. Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't think. It doesn't feel. It doesn't laugh or cry. All it does from dusk till dawn Is make the soldiers die. - Onean children's rhyme

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pit Trap: Destroy target attacking creature without flying. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never forget your feet - Elvish expression meaning "watch your step"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not one for pretty things," said Sisay. "Unless they're pretty useful as well."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Static Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The warriors fought against the paralyzing waves until even their thoughts froze in place.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may play an additional land during each of their turns. Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in their hand on the bottom of their library in any order, then draws that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend." - Onean sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.
